title: Did McConnell Say Democrats ‘Shall Have No Victories’?
subtitle: The remarks attributed to the Senate majority leader were not entirely implausible based on his past pronouncements.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2020, U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell vowed to block Democratic legislative efforts, saying, "Even if I feel it's a good bill. They shall have no victories."
